In a world where parrots are revered for their ability to mimic human speech, a young parrot named Kiko is born with a rare condition that prevents him from repeating words. Despite this, Kiko develops an extraordinary talent for mimicking the sounds of the natural world - the songs of birds, the rustling of leaves, and the gentle babbling of brooks. As Kiko grows older, he becomes a celebrated performer in the avian world, using his unique abilities to create mesmerizing concerts that transport his audience to a world of wonder and awe.

In a post-apocalyptic future, a lone parrot named Ares is the last surviving member of his species. Ares possesses a strange and ancient power - the ability to absorb and manipulate the memories of those around him. As he navigates the treacherous landscape, Ares discovers that he can relive the memories of others, learning their skills, their fears, and their desires. With this power, Ares sets out to rebuild society, using his newfound abilities to guide and protect a small group of survivors as they work to reclaim their world.

In a mystical realm, a parrot named Luna is born with the ability to see into the hearts of those around her. She can sense the deepest desires, the darkest fears, and the most profound wisdom of those who come into contact with her. As Luna grows in power and wisdom, she becomes a sought-after advisor to the rulers of the realm, using her gifts to guide them in times of peace and war. But when a great darkness threatens to consume the land, Luna must use all her cunning and insight to uncover the truth behind the shadows and save her beloved realm from destruction.

In a world where time is currency, the wealthy can live forever, and the poor are left with mere moments to live. A parrot named Tempo is born with the ability to manipulate time itself, slowing down or speeding up the flow of hours, days, and years. As Tempo navigates the complex web of time traders and clockwork machines, he discovers that his powers are not unique, and that there are those who seek to exploit his abilities for their own gain. With the help of a group of rebels, Tempo must use his powers to outwit the time traders and bring about a new era of freedom and equality.
In a world where dreams are a shared experience, a parrot named Somnium is born with the ability to enter and manipulate the dreams of others
